instruction: Given a product name and a fact, come up with a convincing argument to promote this product.
input:
Product Name: Smartphone

Fact: Uses AI technology in facial recognition
output: The Smartphone is the perfect choice for security-conscious users. It comes equipped with AI-powered facial recognition technology that is extremely secure and accurate. This state-of-the-art technology ensures that no one but you can access your device, while also providing a fast and convenient way to unlock your phone. Furthermore, with this innovative technology, you'll never have to worry about forgetting a password or dealing with the hassle of pins and patterns. With the Smartphone, you can enjoy unparalleled security that is simple and fast.
